name.str_sp: Moma coconut and chia porridge pot

description: A small plastic pot of coconut and chia porridge.  Can be kept for a whiles after cooked and then reheated.

name.str_sp: Moma jumbo Oat porridge plain pot

description: A medium plastic pot of jumbo Oat porridge plain.  Can be kept for a whiles after cooked and then reheated.

name.str_sp: Moma porridge cacao and hazelnut pot

description: A medium plastic pot of Moma porridge cacao and hazelnut.  Can be kept for a whiles after cooked and then reheated.
